name: Fubuki: Hell Frozen Over (Prototype)
description:
A vertical shoot em' up prototype submitted for the Greenlight Jam.

Controls

  • Z: Fire
  • X: Bomb
  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Esc: Quit
  • Delete: Pause

Tips and Tricks

  • Your basic bomb will be available quickly, but if you wait until the bomb meter is full, you will get a full-screen bomb that will clear bullets and deal damage for much longer. Bomb wisely.
  • When a bullet comes close to hitting you, your character will flash white and you will hear a "tap" sound. This is mostly a warning, but it also has the benefit of raising the score multiplier.

Note: You CAN beat the highest difficulty. It's very difficult but possible.

If you'd like, feel free to comment with your highest score! Mine was about 59 million at 100% rank.
